english.segment1: Father in heaven forgive me for sinning. I know I need a new beginning. Father in heaven forgive me for sinning. I know I need a new beginning my world is spinning
english.segment2: From sunrise to sunset help me not forget all that you've done for me. From sunset to sunrise help me keep my eyes upon your glory. From sunrise to sunset help me not forget all that you've done for me. From sunset to sunrise help me keep my eyes upon your glory
english.segment3: Say ah yeah (Ah yeah) say alright (alright) every sunset (sunset) and every sunrise (sunrise) Say ah yeah (Ah yeah) say alright (alright) every sunset (sunset) and every sunrise (sunrise)
english.segment4: Oh I need ya, oh I need ya right now
english.segment5: From sunrise to sunset help me not forget all that you've done for me. From sunset to sunrise help me keep my eyes upon your glory You came down from heaven above to show me your way. Your way is to love so help me love love and not judge or hold a grudge saying
english.segment6: Say ah yeah (Ah yeah) say alright (alright) every sunset (sunset) and every sunrise (sunrise) Say ah yeah (Ah yeah) say alright (alright) every sunset (sunset) and every sunrise (sunrise
english.segment7: From sunrise to sunset help me not forget all that you've done for me. From sunset to sunrise help me keep my eyes upon your glory. From sunrise to sunset help me not forget all that you've done for me. From sunset to sunrise help me keep my eyes upon your glory
english.segment8: Father in heaven forgive me for sinning. I know I need a new beginning. Father in heaven forgive me for sinning. I know I need a new beginning my world is spinning X4
